author: MRJAC32
title: Loved the place, perfect location, very Parisian feel.
text:
We booked the Suite, and could not be happier. The location is more in a hipster section, but a close walk to many attractions including the Louvre, the bridges, the Notre Dam Cathedral, etc...
The staff was very friendly and welcoming. We will go back!
Room Tip: The suite at the top was awesome See more room tips
